detail_desc: Long dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a braided halterneck strap, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and opening at the top. Open back and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in softly draping woven fabric with a sheen. Regular waist with concealed elastication. Unlined.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in crinkled jersey with a deep neckline, buttons at the front and short sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim. Narrow, elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with hard-worn details and quilted sections.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with a straight hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Cargo jacket in washed cotton twill with a motif. Collar, buttons down the front, front pockets and flap chest pockets. Unlined.
Wide, satin-covered Alice band with studs.
Nightdress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Knee-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-shaped opening at the front with tasselled ties at the top. Yoke with pleats, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam with pleats at the waist. Unlined.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks with an embroidered motif and elasticated tops.
Cropped top in smocked cotton jersey with elastication at the top and overlocked edges at the top and bottom.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Fitted, ribbed polo-neck top in an asymmetric cut at the front. Long sleeves with shoulder pads and sewn-in turn-ups.
Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a detachable lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Ribbed stand-up collar, flap front pockets with a press-stud and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Set with a vest top and briefs in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a frill at the front of the neckline. Briefs with a frill at the sides that continues round the back.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail. The polyester content of the scrunchie is partly recycled.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Softshell jacket in water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elastic drawstring and small peak, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket with a zip and earphone outlet on the inside, zipped side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Thermal fleece inside. Size of chest pocket approx. 12x17 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved blouse in softly draping satin. V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top, and decorative gathers around the neckline.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Leggings in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a print motif at the top and at the front and back of the hem. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Skirt in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the waist. Unlined.

Short, fitted cold shoulder dress in a crinkled weave with a sweetheart neckline and wide, elasticated shoulder straps. Short, double-layered puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the top and hems for added volume. Concealed zip at the back and gathered seams down the front and back for a softly draped effect. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Long dress with a lace bodice partly lined in satin with side support and a concealed zip in one side. Short cap sleeves, a grosgrain seam at the waist and a lined, pleated skirt in chiffon.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes and a small satin bow at the front.

Long bandeau dress in lace with covered buttons, a concealed zip and hook and eye fastener at the back. Silicone trim and support panels at the top, a seam at the waist with concealed, adjustable elastication, and a heavily draping skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a lace-trimmed seam at the shoulders and an open section at the front with a tie at the neck. Double-layered bodice, short, elasticated puff sleeves with a small frill trim, a concealed zip in one side, a lace-trimmed seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Short jersey underskirt.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with horizontal straps and hooks.
Imitation suede sandals with covered heels and narrow straps with elastication at the sides. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Crescent-shaped waist bag in sturdy imitation leather. Flap with a magnetic press-stud and an adjustable belt with a round metal buckle at the waist. Depth 3.5 cm, height 10.5 cm, width 18 cm.
Top in jersey made from a cotton blend containing glittery threads with a round neck and long sleeves with a gathered seam and flounce at the cuffs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket, contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif at the top, an unlined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and a seam below the knee with flared legs.
5-pocket, high-waisted, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button. Slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Slides with a fluted rubber sole.
Short, cold shoulder top in airy jersey crêpe with a frill-trimmed V-neck, wrapover front, long sleeves and elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a sheen. High waist, a concealed zip in the side  and tapered legs with a frill trim at the hems.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist that has a wide foldover section to adapt to a growing tummy. Opening for the heels, and anti-slip protectors on the bottom of the feet.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, a low crotch and tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.

Ankle-length sports trousers in lightweight, fast-drying functional fabric with wide, covered elastication and an elastic drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with wide, covered elastication at the hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and tie belt. Fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Tunic in softly draping jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and gently rounded hem.
Pleated skirt in stretch jersey with a sheen. Elasticated waist and sewn-in wrapover at the front with ties at the waist. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck with decorative gathers. Tie-top shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Double layer at the top. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and raw-edge hems.
Metal watch with an adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap 2 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch 4 cm.
Jacket in stretch twill with embroidery at the top, a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, tabs with adjustable buttoning at the back, and buttoned cuffs.
Shirt in a crisp cotton weave with a pointed collar, concealed buttons down the front and wide smocking at the waist. Long, pleated sleeves, wide cuffs with concealed buttons, and a rounded hem.
Three-strand metal neckline with chains in various designs. Two decorated with a metal pendant. Adjustable length, 39-47 cm.
Short skirt in an airy viscose and cotton weave. High waist with smocking and a small frill trim. Unlined.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom at the top and earflaps. Fleece lining.
Short, tiered skirt in a patterned weave with wide smocking at the waist.
Tights with a seam down the back of the legs. 30 denier.

Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and raglan sleeves with contrasting colour mesh stripes down the sides.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Sleeveless blouse in a cotton weave with notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets and a drawstring at the waist.
Socks knitted in chenille with elasticated tops.
Double-layered sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Gathered side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and one back pocket. Brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with beaded embroidery around the neckline, 3/4-length puff sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs and a wide, ribbed trim at the hem.

Outdoor trousers in slightly stretchy, functional fabric with a zip fly and press-stud and a hook and loop fastening. Side pockets, a zipped leg pocket, and tapered legs with seams at the knees for optimum comfort and mobility, and reinforced hems.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a lace-covered V-neck at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined at the top.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
